Divya Khosla Kumar Height | Age | Husband | Family | Biography | Wiki

Bolly Reporter
4 days ago

Divya Khosla Kumar is an Indian film Actress, Producer, and Director. Divya was born in a middle-class family in Delhi. She moved to Mumbai to pursue her career. Finally, she made her debut in Tollywood film “Love Today” in 2004. Also, she made her debut in the Hindi film industry with Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo.

Biography & Wiki

Divya Khosla’s nickname is Sitara. She was born on 27 November 1981 in Delhi, India in a Hindu family. Hence, her current age is 38 years. Divya’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Divya Khosla Family Members

Divya Khosla’s father is a businessman. Her mother’s name is Not Known and she was a teacher.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Divya Khosla Kumar married to Bhushan Kumar in 2005. Bhushan Kumar is the son of Late Gulshan Kumar who is the founder of T-Series. They married in Maa Vaishno Devi shrine, Katra. The couple has a son, named Ruhaan.

Education and School, College

Divya school and collage details are not available in the current moment. She has completed her honors in Bachelor of Commerce.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Divya Khosla Kumar filmography

Divya moved to Mumbai from Delhi to become an actress and start working in music videos. She also works with Salman Khan for one music video. Finally, she debuted in Telegu Movie “Love Today” in 2004. After that, she debuts in Hindi Movie “Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo“. Later, she joined in a course of cinematography and editing. Divya Khosla debut as a director with the movie “Yaariyan” in 2014. She not only directed the film Sanam Re but also did an item song called Humne Pee Rakhi Hai in it.

Divya is a good dancer and choreographed 5 songs in the film Yaariyan: Baarish, Maa, Love Me Thoda Aur, Allah-Waariyan and Zor Lagake.

She produced many movies like Roy, Batla House, Marjaavaan, etc. Her music video “Yaad Piya Ki Aane Lagi” in 2019, become viral.

Salary and Net Worth

Divya Khosla Kumar’s current net worth is $5 Million. She is the stakeholder of T-series and has a net worth of $406 million dollars as of March 2020.

Contact Address

Facts about Divya Khosla Kumar

  • She was good at studies in her schooling days and was an avid reader.
  • In 2003, she was seen in a Hindi pop song Kabhi Yaadon Me Aau Kabhi Khwabon Mein Aau by Abhijeet.
  • In 2006, she also featured in a Hindi pop song Honey Honey with Salman Khan which was sung by Roop Johri and Kunal Ganjawala.
  • Her son Ruhaan was once diagnosed with swine flu.
  • Furthermore, In 2015, she was seen on the cover page of AsiaSpa Magazine.
